data: ECHO-GL Liu et al. (2024a)
Heterogeneous graph learning mula sa data ng earnings calls
Dual-mechanism approach na nagkakasundo ng spatial relations kasama ang stock dynamics
MGDPR You et al. (2024)
Dynamic relationship modeling sa pamamagitan ng information entropy
Multi-relational diffusion process na may parallel retention
Consistent outperformance sa buong NASDAQ, NYSE, Shanghai (2016-2023)
LARA Zeng et al. (2024)
Two-stage denoising framework na may locality-aware attention
Iterative refinement labeling para sa noise reduction
Precision: 59.1% Improved win-loss ratio sa volatile markets
MANA-Net Wang and Ma (2024)
Dynamic market-news attention mechanism
Trainable sentiment aggregation na optimized para sa prediction
SH-Mix Jain et al. (2024)
Hierarchical multimodal augmentation strategy
Modality-specific at span-based mixing techniques
Performance improvement: 3-7% sa buong tasks
SEP Koa et al. (2024a)
Self-reflective LLM framework para sa autonomous learning
Three-stage pipeline na may PPO optimization
Superior performance sa parehong prediction at explanation quality
